snippet: A research group for the world’s most developed countries, forecasts global growth of 3.6 percent this year, up from an estimated 2.7 percent in 2013.
abstract: Report by Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development says that economic growth is gaining momentum in advanced countries; forecasts global growth of 3.6 percent in 2014, up from an estimated 2.7 percent in 2013.
lead_paragraph: A research group for the world’s most developed countries, forecasts global growth of 3.6 percent this year, up from an estimated 2.7 percent in 2013.

headline.main: Developed World Growth Taking Hold, Report Says
headline.print_headline: Developed World Growth Taking Hold, Report Says

keywords.value: Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development
keywords.name: organizations
